data.lyric:
[ti:Heat Waves]
[ar:Glass Animals]
[al:Heat Waves]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Heat Waves - Glass Animals
[00:01.22]Lyrics by：Dave Bayley
[00:02.45]Composed by：Dave Bayley
[00:03.67]Last night all I think about is you
[00:06.55]Don't stop baby you can walk through
[00:09.47]Don't wanna but I think about you
[00:12.90]You know that I'm never gonna do
[00:30.24]Road shimmer wigglin' the vision
[00:32.70]Heat heat waves I'm swimmin' in a mirror
[00:36.13]Road shimmer wigglin' the vision
[00:38.73]Heat heat waves I'm swimmin' in a
[00:42.08]Sometimes all I think about is you
[00:45.04]Late nights in the middle of June
[00:47.94]Heat waves been fakin' me out
[00:50.91]Can't make you happier now
[00:53.89]Sometimes all I think about is you
[00:56.91]Late nights in the middle of June
[00:59.94]Heat waves been fakin' me out
[01:02.79]Can't make you happier now
[01:05.75]Usually I put somethin' on TV
[01:08.78]So we never think about you and me
[01:11.68]But today I see our reflections clearly
[01:14.94]In Hollywood layin' on the screen
[01:17.58]You just need a better life than this
[01:20.57]You need somethin' I can never give
[01:23.59]Fake water all across the road
[01:26.46]It's gone now the night has come but
[01:29.41]Sometimes all I think about is you
[01:32.56]Late nights in the middle of June
[01:35.56]Heat waves been fakin' me out
[01:38.43]Can't make you happier now
[01:41.11]You can't fight it you can't breathe
[01:43.98]You say somethin' so lovin' but
[01:47.30]Now I gotta let you go
[01:50.51]You'll be better off in someone new
[01:53.21]I don't wanna be alone
[01:56.21]You know it hurts me too
[01:59.33]You look so broken when you cry
[02:02.35]One more and then I say goodbye
[02:05.10]Sometimes all I think about is you
[02:08.10]Late nights in the middle of June
[02:11.12]Heat waves been fakin' me out
[02:14.16]Can't make you happier now
[02:17.04]Sometimes all I think about is you
[02:19.97]Late nights in the middle of June
[02:23.01]Heat waves been fakin' me out
[02:25.94]Can't make you happier now
[02:28.88]I just wanna know what you're dreamin' of
[02:31.81]When you sleep and smile so comfortable
[02:34.80]I just wish that I could give you that
[02:37.85]That look that's perfectly un-sad
[02:40.77]Sometimes all I think about is you
[02:43.69]Late nights in the middle of June
[02:46.85]Heat waves been fakin' me out
[02:49.67]Heat waves been fakin' me out
[02:55.61]Sometimes all I think about is you
[02:58.59]Late nights in the middle of June
[03:01.70]Heat waves been fakin' me out
[03:04.58]Can't make you happier now
[03:07.55]Sometimes all I think about is you
[03:10.48]Late nights in the middle of June
[03:13.45]Heat waves been fakin' me out
[03:16.36]Can't make you happier now
[03:19.40]Road shimmer wigglin' the vision
[03:21.97]Heat heat waves I'm swimmin' in a mirror
[03:25.32]Road shimmer wigglin' the vision
[03:28.05]Heat heat waves I'm swimmin' in a mirror
data.trans:
[ti:Heat Waves]
[ar:Glass Animals]
[al:Heat Waves]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.22]//
[00:02.44]//
[00:03.67]昨晚 我脑海里想的全是你
[00:06.55]别放弃 宝贝 你可以安然渡过难关
[00:09.47]尽管我不愿意 可我思念着你
[00:12.90]你知道我永远无法忘记你
[00:30.24]眼前的道路光芒闪烁 幻象摇曳
[00:32.70]热浪来袭 我徜徉在镜花水月里
[00:36.13]眼前的道路光芒闪烁 幻象摇曳
[00:38.73]热浪来袭 我徜徉在镜花水月里
[00:42.08]有时 我脑海里想的全是你
[00:45.04]六月中旬的深夜时分
[00:47.94]热浪来袭 蒙蔽我的双眼
[00:50.91]如今我无法让你感到幸福
[00:53.89]有时 我脑海里想的全是你
[00:56.91]六月中旬的深夜时分
[00:59.94]热浪来袭 蒙蔽我的双眼
[01:02.79]如今我无法让你感到幸福
[01:05.75]我通常会打开电视 分散我的注意力
[01:08.78]我们从未想到你和我之间的点点滴滴
[01:11.68]可今天我发现艺术源自生活
[01:14.94]在好莱坞 现实生活被搬上荧幕
[01:17.58]你只需要一个更美好的人生
[01:20.57]我无法给予你需要的一切
[01:23.59]马路对面仿佛湿漉漉的
[01:26.46]一切都消失殆尽 夜幕降临
[01:29.41]有时 我脑海里想的全是你
[01:32.56]六月中旬的深夜时分
[01:35.56]热浪来袭 蒙蔽我的双眼
[01:38.43]如今我无法让你感到幸福
[01:41.11]你无能为力 你感到窒息
[01:43.98]你对我说着甜言蜜语
[01:47.30]如今我得放手
[01:50.51]你另寻新欢会过得更好
[01:53.21]我不愿孤零零的一个人
[01:56.21]你知道我也痛不欲生
[01:59.33]当你掉眼泪时 你看上去很难过
[02:02.35]我再次陷入沉思 我告别过去
[02:05.10]有时 我脑海里想的全是你
[02:08.10]六月中旬的深夜时分
[02:11.12]热浪来袭 蒙蔽我的双眼
[02:14.16]如今我无法让你感到幸福
[02:17.04]有时 我脑海里想的全是你
[02:19.97]六月中旬的深夜时分
[02:23.01]热浪来袭 蒙蔽我的双眼
[02:25.94]如今我无法让你感到幸福
[02:28.88]我只想知道你梦见了什么
[02:31.81]当你酣然入睡 浅浅的笑容让人感到安心
[02:34.80]我希望我可以让你如愿
[02:37.85]露出没有一丝悲伤的表情
[02:40.77]有时 我脑海里想的全是你
[02:43.69]六月中旬的深夜时分
[02:46.85]热浪来袭 蒙蔽我的双眼
[02:49.67]热浪来袭 蒙蔽我的双眼
[02:55.61]有时 我脑海里想的全是你
